template.name: ref
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", ref="#/components/schemas/$AUTOCOMPLETE$")

template.name: num
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="number", format="$FORMAT$", nullable=$NULLABLE$, minimum="$MINIMUM$", maximum="$MAXIMUM$", example="$EXAMPLE$"$SUGGESTIONS$)

template.name: int
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="number", format="$FORMAT$", nullable=$NULLABLE$, minimum="$MINIMUM$", maximum="$MAXIMUM$", example="$EXAMPLE$"$SUGGESTIONS$)

template.name: str
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="string", format="$FORMAT$", nullable=$NULLABLE$, minLength="$MINIMUM$", maxLength="$MAXIMUM$", example="A $EXAMPLE$")

template.name: date
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="string", format="$FORMAT$", nullable=$NULLABLE$, example="$EXAMPLE$")

template.name: bool
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="boolean", example=true)

template.name: arr
template.value: @OA\Property(property="$NAME$", type="array", @OA\Items($SUGGESTIONS$))

template.name: get1
template.value: @OA\Get( * path="/$SCHEMA$s/{$PARAMETER$_id}", * summary="Get one $TITLE$ by id", * tags={"$END$$TITLE$s"}, * description="Get one $TITLE$ resrource by id", * operationId="get$OPERATION$", * @OA\Parameter(ref="#/components/parameters/$PARAMETER$_id"), * @OA\Response( * response=200, * description="Successful operation", * @OA\JsonContent( * @OA\Property(property="data", ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$"), * @OA\Property(property="included", type="array", @OA\Items(type="object")), * @OA\Property(property="meta", ref="#/components/schemas/defaultMeta") * ) * ), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )

template.name: get2
template.value: @OA\Get( * path="/$SCHEMA$s", * summary="Get the list of $TITLE$s", * tags={"$END$$TITLE$s"}, * description="Get the list of $TITLE$s resources", * operationId="get$OPERATION$sList", * @OA\Response( * response=200, * description="Successful operation", * @OA\JsonContent( * @OA\Property(property="data", type="array", @OA\Items(ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$")), * @OA\Property(property="included", type="array", @OA\Items(type="object")), * @OA\Property(property="meta", ref="#/components/schemas/defaultMeta") * ) * ), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )

template.name: post
template.value: @OA\Post( * path="/$SCHEMA$s", * tags={"$END$$TITLE$s"}, * summary="Create a new $TITLE$", * operationId="create$OPERATION$", * @OA\RequestBody( * @OA\JsonContent( * description="A new $TITLE$ resource", * ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$" * ) * ), * @OA\Response( * response=201, * description="A new $TITLE$ created", * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$") * ), * @OA\Response(response=422, ref="#/components/responses/422"), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )

template.name: del
template.value: @OA\Delete( * path="/$SCHEMA$s/{$PARAMETER$_id}", * summary="Delete a $TITLE$ by id", * tags={"$END$$TITLE$s"}, * description="Delete a $TITLE$ by id", * operationId="delete$OPERATION$", * @OA\Parameter(ref="#/components/parameters/$PARAMETER$_id"), * @OA\Response(response=204, ref="#/components/responses/204"), * @OA\Response(response=404, ref="#/components/responses/404"), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )

template.name: res
template.value: @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$Identifier", * description="$TITLE$ identifier", * title="$TITLE$ resource identifier", * @OA\Property(property="id", type="string", nullable=false, minLength=18, maxLength=18, example="$END$"), * @OA\Property(property="type", type="string", nullable=false, example="$SCHEMA$") * ) * * @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$", * description="$TITLE$ resource", * title="$TITLE$", * allOf={@OA\Schema(ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$Identifier")}, * @OA\Property(property="attributes", ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$Attributes"), * @OA\Property(property="links", ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$Links"), * @OA\Property(property="relationships", ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$Relationships"), * @OA\Property(property="meta", ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$Meta") * ) * * @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$Attributes", * description="$TITLE$ resource attributes", * title="$TITLE$ attributes", * str * ) * * @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$Links", * description="$TITLE$ links", * title="$TITLE$ resource links", * @OA\Property(property="self", type="string", format="uri", nullable=false, minLength="1", maxLength="100", example="$SELF_LINK$"), * uri * ) * * @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$Relationships", * description="$TITLE$ relationships", * title="$TITLE$ resource relationships", * arr * prop * ) * * @OA\Schema( * schema="$SCHEMA$Meta", * description="$TITLE$ resource meta", * title="$TITLE$ meta", * bool * )

template.name: uri
template.value: @OA\Property( * property="$NAME$", * @OA\Property(property="href", type="string", format="uri", nullable=false, example="$END$"), * @OA\Property( * property="$NAME$", * @OA\Property(property="method", type="string", format="", nullable=false, example="$METHOD$") * ) * )

template.name: put
template.value: @OA\Put( * path="/$SCHEMA$s/{$PARAMETER$_id}", * tags={"$END$$TITLE$s"}, * summary="Update an existing $TITLE$", * operationId="update$OPERATION$", * @OA\Parameter(ref="#/components/parameters/$PARAMETER$_id"), * @OA\RequestBody( * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$") * ), * @OA\Response( * response=200, * description="Content updated", * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/$SCHEMA$") * ), * @OA\Response(response=404, ref="#/components/responses/404"), * @OA\Response(response=422, ref="#/components/responses/422"), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )

template.name: patch
template.value: @OA\Patch( * path="/$SCHEMA$/$PARAMETER$_id", * tags={"$END$TITLE$s"}, * summary="Update $TITLE$", * operationId="update$OPERATION$", * parr * @OA\RequestBody( * @OA\JsonContent( * * ) * ), * @OA\Response(response=204, ref="#/components/responses/204"), * @OA\Response(response=404, ref="#/components/responses/404"), * @OA\Response(response=422, ref="#/components/responses/422"), * @OA\Response(response=401, ref="#/components/responses/401"), * @OA\Response(response=403, ref="#/components/responses/403"), * @OA\Response(response=405, ref="#/components/responses/405"), * @OA\Response(response=410, ref="#/components/responses/410"), * @OA\Response(response=429, ref="#/components/responses/429") * )
